title: FULLY RENOVATED!  AVAILABLE 10/1!  HARDWOOD, GRANITE, STAINLESS, A/C
posting_body: ['FULLY RENOVATED APARTMENT!', 'MID-CENTURY MEETS MODERN IN PEACEFUL SETTING!', 'HARDWOOD, STAINLESS & GRANITE', 'Property Address', '636 Larpenteur Ave W - #4 | St. Paul, MN 55113', 'Available: 10/01/2022', 'Offered By', 'Guardian Property Management |', 'show contact info', 'Description', 'To apply, go to <URL>  Each adult would apply and upload last two pay statements and proof of other income.', 'Newly renovated apartment in this classic Mid-Century building located in the idyllic Como Park neighborhood are available!', ' Under new ownership!', 'Available October 1!', ' Live in a fully renovated second floor corner apartment, with newly refinished oak floors, stainless steel appliances, and great kitchen cabinets topped with granite and subway tile backsplash.', 'Each apartment includes an on site storage unit at no extra charge.', 'This is a non-smoking building.', 'The bright and clean on-site laundry room contains new machines.', 'One off street parking space is provided at no charge; garage parking is $50/month if available.', 'Easy distance from downtown St. Paul (10 minutes), downtown Minneapolis (18 minutes) and both U of MN campuses.', 'Steps from bus lines on Larpenteur and Dale.', 'Enjoy this charming neighborhood, surrounded by green space.', 'Walk to Como Park, Lake McCarrons, and Tamarack Park.', 'A short hop to Keys Café and Bakery and their famous roast beef sandwiches.', 'Or Ol’ Mexico Cantina, The Original Malt Shop, Dairy Queen and more.', 'Cub Foods, Walgreens and Rosedale Center are also nearby.', 'The North Dale Recreation Center, 5 blocks away, hosts all sorts of activities: sports, yoga, martial arts, pickle ball, art, crafts and dance.', 'We love animals.', 'Up to two cats or one dog (certain breeds) allowed with a $250 additional security deposit.', 'Rent includes water/sewer, trash and gas (heat)', '$50 application fee per adult', 'We check income (gross household income must be at least 3 times rent), credit (must be 600+, criminal and rental history', 'Call Dakota at', 'show contact info', 'to schedule a showing', 'Agent: Dakota DeHaven', 'BROKER: GUARDIAN PROPERTY MANAGEMENT AND SERVICES LLC', 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 1BD/1.0BA', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $927.00', 'Available: 10/01/2022', 'Application Fee: $50.00', 'Security Deposit: $927.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats allowed', 'Dogs allowed']
